item.title: BYD, Xpeng Lead Chinese EV Surge In Europe As Market Share Hits 10.6% Despite Tariffs: Report
item.description: Chinese EV companies captured 10.6% of Europe's EV market share in June despite EU tariffs. BYD and Xpeng saw significant sales growth. read more
